DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess the long-term safety and efficacy of bixalomer under post-marketed setting.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of Bixalomer in Patients With Pre-dialysis Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with predialysis chronic kidney disease complicated by hyperphosphatemia who used bixalomer for the first time
